## 🚀 Pinned Projects (auto-updated)

> The generator reads `projects.json` and pulls latest description, primary language, stars, forks and last commit timestamp.

### AI Career Counselor — `hardikko/AI-Career-Counselor`
Smart career advisor: resume analysis, skills-gap filler, PDF reports and interview prep automation.  
**Tech:** Python · Streamlit · Flask · Transformers · Pandas · Scikit-Learn · Docker  
[![Repo Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/hardikko/AI-Career-Counselor?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/hardikko/AI-Career-Counselor) [![Repo Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/hardikko/AI-Career-Counselor?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/hardikko/AI-Career-Counselor/issues)

---

### Stock Market Prediction (LSTM) — `hardikko/stock-market-prediction-LSTM`
LSTM-based time-series forecasting with walk-forward validation, checkpoints and backtesting notebooks.  
**Tech:** Python · TensorFlow · Keras · LSTM · Pandas · NumPy  
[![Repo Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/hardikko/stock-market-prediction-LSTM?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/hardikko/stock-market-prediction-LSTM)

---

### SignSpeak — `hardikko/SignSpeak`
Real-time sign-language-to-text/speech translator using CV and keypoint models (accessibility-focused).  
**Tech:** TensorFlow · OpenCV · MediaPipe · TTS · Streamlit  
[![Repo Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/hardikko/SignSpeak?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/hardikko/SignSpeak)

## 🔁 Automation & Dynamic Cards

This repo includes GitHub Actions to:
- Auto-fetch project metadata and last commit (generator).
- Auto-generate/refresh banner (`./assets/banner.png`) via optional image API.
- Generate 3D contribution visual and contribution-snake animation via community actions.  
(See `.github/workflows/*.yml`.)

## 📌 Notes & Setup

1. Create this repo under your username (`hardikko`) — GitHub reads profile README from `username/username`.  
2. Add `projects.json` (template included).  
3. Add optional secrets (Repo Settings → Secrets → Actions):  
   - `REPLICATE_API_TOKEN` (optional, for banner generation)  
   - `DEVTO_USERNAME` or `MEDIUM_RSS` (optional, blog fetch)  
4. Enable Actions and run **Workflow → generate-readme.yml** manually the first time (or wait for the scheduled run).

---

## Best approach for maintaining this profile
1. Keep `projects.json` as canonical list of your pinned repos.  
2. Let GitHub Actions update README daily — commit only content / code changes in your projects.  
3. If you want private stats in the cards, deploy your own instance of `github-readme-stats` with a personal GitHub token (see that project's docs). :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

---
